attributes.action: provide all British taxpayers with cake.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every month, a substantial proportion of my salary is deducted from my income in order to pay for such things as "binmen", "healthcare" and "police". 
I was not consulted on these deductions, which the government like to call "tax". The binmen only come once a fortnight, I'm not ill, and I don't commit crimes. I therefore request that my monthly £500 is instead allocated to the provision of cake. Preferably chocolate chip. Or cheese.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
